txt.en: 'Well, these will do right nicely, [placeholder]! Where better to get dwarf-steel moulds than the dwarves?\n\n'You tell Master Laerdan that I'll send a rider down with Arel as soon as the new shoes are finished.'
'I can't finish these horseshoes without dwarf-steel cutlery moulds. You can purchase them from an expert metalsmith at Thorin's Hall, I think.'

'Well now, Laerdan sends you to bring his horse back to him? That'll be a mite difficult. You see, he badly needs new shoes, and I haven't the materials to finish them.

'Without some dwarf-steel cutlery moulds, there's not much more I can do. I hear there's an expert metalsmith at Thorin's Hall, out in the Blue Mountains way off to the west, who might have some, but I can't leave.

'Perhaps you would make the journey to Thorin's Hall and purchase a few of the moulds? I'm sure I could make it worth your while....'
Laerdan has asked you to speak with Nat Collop, a Man of Ost Forod who oversees the stable at Tinnudír, about sending his horse, Arel, to Rivendell.
Bring the dwarf-steel cutlery moulds to Nat Collop at Tinnudír
Thorin's Hall is in Ered Luin, far to the west and south of Evendim.\n\nNat Collop has asked you to speak with the expert metalsmith at Thorin's Hall and obtain some dwarf-steel cutlery moulds.
Thorin's Hall is in Ered Luin, far to the west and south of Evendim.\n\nNat Collop has asked you to speak with the expert metalsmith at Thorin's Hall and obtain some dwarf-steel cutlery moulds.
